Sentencas: The perovskite with nominal composition LaNi0.6Co0.4O3 was evaluated for the use as a possible solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode.
Titulo: Characterisation of LaNi1-xCoxO3 as a possible SOFC cathode material

Sentencas: Thick film layers, printed and fired on yttria stabilised zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte, exhibit good characteristics, i.e. a porous microstructure, a temperature expansion coefficient of 11.9 X 10(-6)/K, and low, temperature independent, sheet resistivity.
Titulo: Characterisation of LaNi1-xCoxO3 as a possible SOFC cathode material

Sentencas: However, LaNi0.6Co0.4O3 reacts with YSZ at lower temperatures than other perovskites which are usually used for SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Characterisation of LaNi1-xCoxO3 as a possible SOFC cathode material
